entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
